name: Dall-E Image Generator
description: Generates an image using the OpenAI Dall-E model from a text prompt. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, SecretStrInput, BoolInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from openai import OpenAI

class DallEImageGenerator(Component):
    display_name = "Dall-E Image Generator"
    description = "Generates an image using the OpenAI Dall-E model from a text prompt."
    icon = "image"
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="prompt",
            display_name="Text Prompt",
            info="Enter the text prompt to generate an image.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="model",
            display_name="Model",
            info="Select the DALL-E model version to use.",
            options=["dall-e-2", "dall-e-3"],
            value="dall-e-3"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="quality",
            display_name="Quality",
            info="Select the image generation quality.",
            options=["standard", "hd"],
            value="standard"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="size",
            display_name="Image Size",
            info="Select the output image dimensions.",
            options=["1024x1024", "1024x1792", "1792x1024"],
            value="1024x1024"
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="openai_api_key",
            display_name="OpenAI API Key",
            info="The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.",
            advanced=False,
            value="OPENAI_API_KEY",
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Generated Image", name="generated_image", method="generate_image"),
    ]

    def generate_image(self) -> Message:
        prompt = self.prompt
        openai_api_key = self.openai_api_key
        client = OpenAI(api_key=openai_api_key)

        try:
            response = client.images.generate(
                model=self.model,
                prompt=prompt,
                size=self.size,
                quality=self.quality,
                n=1,
            )
            image_url = response.data[0].url
            self.status = f"Image generated successfully: {image_url}"
            return Message(text=image_url)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Failed to generate image: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, SecretStrInput, BoolInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from openai import OpenAI

class DallEImageGenerator(Component):
    display_name = "Dall-E Image Generator"
    description = "Generates an image using the OpenAI Dall-E model from a text prompt."
    icon = "image"
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="prompt",
            display_name="Text Prompt",
            info="Enter the text prompt to generate an image.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="model",
            display_name="Model",
            info="Select the DALL-E model version to use.",
            options=["dall-e-2", "dall-e-3"],
            value="dall-e-3"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="quality",
            display_name="Quality",
            info="Select the image generation quality.",
            options=["standard", "hd"],
            value="standard"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="size",
            display_name="Image Size",
            info="Select the output image dimensions.",
            options=["1024x1024", "1024x1792", "1792x1024"],
            value="1024x1024"
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="openai_api_key",
            display_name="OpenAI API Key",
            info="The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.",
            advanced=False,
            value="OPENAI_API_KEY",
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Generated Image", name="generated_image", method="generate_image"),
    ]

    def generate_image(self) -> Message:
        prompt = self.prompt

        try:
            response = client.images.generate(
                model=self.model,
                prompt=prompt,
                size=self.size,
                quality=self.quality,
                n=1,

            return Message(text=image_url)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Failed to generate image: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)
